title: NRI Institute of Technology: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement
meta_description: NRI Institute of Technology Admission 2024 is open for various courses. NRI Institute of Technology Admission is based on national level entrance exam and merit basis. Check latest updates and news on NRI Institute of Technology Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Rankings, Placement and other details.

basic_info.name: NRIIT Krishna Admission
description: Admissions to the B.Tech program are made on the basis of the candidate’s scores obtained in AP-EAMCET. For M.Tech admissions, candidates must have a valid score in GATE/AP-PGECET.

basic_info.name: NRIIT Krishna Placement
description: Nri Institute of Technology consists of a training and placement cell that plays an important role in placing graduate students in prestigious companies. It makes the students ready for the recruitment process. Potential recruiters are invited to schedule interviews, conduct GDs, seminars, and written tests.
Some of the top recruiters are Value Labs, Mphasis, TCS, Optum, Wipro, CTS, Mind Tree, Infosys, IBM, Virtusa Polaris, Miracle, CGI, and many more.

faqs.question: What are the career prospects after pursuing B.Tech in Electrical & Electronics Engineering atNRIIT Krishna?
faqs.answer: Ans.A lot of career opportunities open after completion of B.Tech Electrical & Electronics Engineering. Some of the top job positions are Control and instrumentation engineer, Electrical engineer, Broadcast engineer, Manufacturing systems engineer, Systems analyst, Electronics engineer, IT consultant, Systems developer, and more

faqs.question: How are the accommodation facilities atNRIIT Krishna?
faqs.answer: A Separate safe & secure, spacious, well-furnished Women’s and Men’s Hostel is available within the campus. The facilities provided in the hostel are of high quality and can accommodate 200 students. A hygienic mess facility is available for students.Read more:NRI Institute of Technology Hostel

faqs.question: Which course records the highest number of placements at NRIIT Krishna?
faqs.answer: Ans.All the courses record a good number of placements every year. As per the previous year’s placement statistics, B.Tech CSE has recorded the highest number of placements for four consecutive years.

faqs.question: How are the faculties of NRIIT Krishna?
faqs.answer: The institute has a team of associate and assistant professors in every department who are highly qualified and experienced. They are committed to provide high-quality education.Read more:NRI Institute of Technology Faculty

faqs.question: Does NRIIT Krishna provide transportation facilities?
faqs.answer: Yes, the college has its own Transport facility to make the journey easy for both day-scholar students and staff. College buses are operated by experienced drivers to and from various spots of Vijayawada and Nujiveedu.

Section.name: About NRIIT
Section.description:
NRI Institute of Technology is a private institute established in the year 2008. It is affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada and has been approved by AICTE and has been accredited by NAAC with grade A. The college offers B.Tech in 6 disciplines at the UG level, MBA, M.Tech, MCA at the PG level. It is well-equipped with outstanding academic facilities like seminar hall, canteen, hostels, library, internet, gym & many more. NRIIT ranked at 62nd place in Top T Schools in India in Private Colleges and 70th in Top T Schools in India in Private and Government Colleges by Dataquest CMR Survey Top T Schools 2023.
The college has maintained a decent placement record in reputed organizations. In the placement drive of 2023, more than 438 got placed in various companies. The highest package stood at INR 11.3 LPA and the average package at INR 3.5 LPA.
